text: Sir Roger Geoffrey Gibbs (13 October 1934 - 3 October 2018) was a British financier. He held senior positions on the board of directors of Arsenal Football Club, the Wellcome Trust and Fleming Family & Partners. Gibbs died on 3 October 2018 at the age of 83. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2018 deaths Category:British businesspeople
title: Roger Gibbs
